TopicTitle: Need recruits for a starmade faction (Nextech Enterprises Recruiting)

- - - Updated - - -

Hope the planet has a good amount of sertise, You see rarity of materials doesnt apply to planets when the game generates them it picks two random resources for each plate and it can be anything ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Well so far the list of ships that have been mysteriously damaged/destroyed/MIA is:

NXE Starblaster

James Lawrence

NXE Whatever

USS Enderprise

AUS-2 Kiternyae I have a sneaking suspicion that someone was involved here too, but I found it undamaged.

I'm preparing for Plan Z: Pack it all up, kick the non-forum members for now, jump out, rebuild.

So, now that we have our current gate linked to a mining outpost, I'll be setting up another gate specifically routed to spawn.

It's going to be 51x51, so most if not all of our ships can pass though it with ease. On the other end however, the gate's only going to be 1/2 to 1/3 of the other's size to prevent suspicious characters from entering our space.

I'll be constructing the base side of the gate, but I'll also give the task of the other side amongst yourselves; How large and who's building it?

One-way highway? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Am I the only one who knows of the Starforge gates or have you guys been using those too?

When I next get on, I can probably build the other end and connect them. The AUS-2 should be able to fit through the farside gate. It's a slim ship, so unless the enemy's going full *Heighliner*-style death cylinders, we should be safe from the big guys.

EDIT:

Unless they've built ships specially designed to make it through even the tiniest warpgate. All that needs to pass through is the core... and now that the core can be exposed without worry, it will be a big problem.

- - - Updated - - -

OMG i just found an entire field of HYLAT!!!

i think that for security reasons we should fortify the base

Edit:i wont be able to log in for a while i am going to summer camp on saturday

Well, Jeremy may have found the problem with the damaged ships: NXE Firestorm's turrets were firing at our own ships by themselves.

I've started construction of a superweapon ship; I can't decide if I want machine-gun style cannon, or a massive bolt that hits the target nearly instantly but has an 8 second reload.

The massive bolt destroys over 700k shields in one hit, and can go through the entirety of the *Kalzoria Star*, ripping out many blocks. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) It's downfall is that it has a low damage per second, and a lot of it's total damage is wasted by the fact that the bolt will exit out of the other side of the ship.

The machine-gun takes a much greater time to destroy shields, has a limited range and speed of bolt, but deals catastrophic amounts of armor and system damage once it breaks through.

Both of these only have 1 "shot" at a time, however. I'm going to set up a few tests to see what happens with multiple barrels.

- - - Updated - - -

ATTENTION all founders please recruit as many trustable people as possible, IRL friends, Relatives, And other forum users. Im aiming to topple the Eighth Imperium as dominant power on the server.

- - - Updated - - -

One more thing... Please dont use cannons anymore, Due to the rarity of Hylat in our area of space, We will have to use beams and missiles.

> 
> Sounds good, Also if you will check the "Personal enemies" section of the faction menu, I think you'll see our griefer.

No, that guy was just being an ass and stealing ships so I stuck him there. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I've made an autominer! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Planet-eating will commence.
I built a new ship check it out sometime! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I brought an ally over for a visit, He thought the firestorm and the starblaster were pretty impressive, I gave him blueprint for the helios as a gift.

> 
> I brought an ally over for a visit, He thought the firestorm and the starblaster were pretty impressive, I gave him blueprint for the helios as a gift.

Aww... too bad the *Kalzoria Star* wasn't over there at the time. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Speaking of which, I've been testing out weapons for a very large ship, and with one salvo (or less) it can destroy the *Kalzoria Star*. More on that when it's nearing completion.
I accidently got the John Paul Jones and the Serenity Bay Severely damaged, The former was not fatal, But the latter i had to scrap and rebuild from blueprint! CURSE YOU PIRATES WITH MISSILES!

I brought this Scorpion fellow to our homebase (He was a faction member already) and then the server restarted.

I'll be widening the salvage head of the autominer to have full planetary face coverage. It requires about 6 passes to eat an entire face, shortening it to 1 will be much easier.
I have built a cheap and effective torpedo launching system and have already made 500k in sales

I've been trying to get alliances with the major powers of the server so we wont be destroyed, i've been talking to lordsidonus of the Galaxion empire and he wants to know if i have the permission of the other cofounders before he considers alliance
Sionus is considering an alliance you say? By all means, Having the Galaxions on our side would definitely be of use to us, especially against the SWARM imo.
